entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 2:27AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Prolonged Arctic Blast Late Weekend Into Early Next Week... A mid-winter arctic front is coming this weekend with seasonably cold temperatures lasting well into next week.
